name: attributeContainsWord
title: Attribute Contains Word Selector [name~="value"]
desc: Selects elements that have the specified attribute with a value containing a given word, delimited by spaces.

argument.desc: An attribute value. Can be either an unquoted single word or a quoted string.
argument.name: value

examples.desc: Finds all inputs with a name attribute that contains the word 'man' and sets the value with some text.

entries.longdesc: This selector matches the test string against each word in the attribute value, where a "word" is defined as a string delimited by whitespace. The selector matches if the test string is exactly equal to any of the words.
